entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
